properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:52AM EST until February 6 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of
an inch.

* WHERE...All of Northeast Pennsylvania.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of snow will develop this
evening, which will transition to sleet and freezing rain
overnight. Valleys may get warm enough for freezing rain to
change to rain around dawn Thursday, but it may take until late
morning to get above freezing at higher elevations.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways,
and traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST THURSDAY
